title: Features
content:
# Base Features

![edit-select-all.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/edit-select-all.png?rev=1.4)

[Page editing](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/PageEditing)  
Use simple [wiki syntax](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/XWikiSyntax/) to format text, create tables, create links, display images, etc. Alternatively use a powerful [WYSIWYG editor](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/CKEditor%20Integration/) to edit  the content of pages.

![document-open.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/document-open.png?rev=1.4)

[History](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/VersionControl)  
Any change made in XWiki is saved under version control, meaning you can view any previous version of a page, compare different versions or rollback to any past version.

![edit-find-replace.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/edit-find-replace.png?rev=1.6)

[Navigation](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Navigate/)  
Navigate to wiki pages easily (search, page index, breadcrumb, URL, jump to page, etc).

![applications-internet.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/applications-internet.png?rev=1.6)

[Content Organization](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/ContentOrganization/)  
Organize your pages by grouping them together by domain.

![edit-undo.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/edit-undo.png?rev=1.1)

[Imports](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Imports)  
Import content inside XWiki: Office, XWiki pages, Other wiki content, Excel, CSV, etc.

![edit-redo.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/edit-redo.png?rev=1.1)

[Exports](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Exports)  
Export wiki pages to PDF, ODT, RTF, XML or HTML.

![accessories-text-editor.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/accessories-text-editor.png?rev=1.6)

[Programming](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Programming)  
Use XWiki's programming API directly into your pages (Velocity or Groovy) to perform advanced formatting, layout or anything really.

![package-x-generic.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/package-x-generic.png?rev=1.4)

[Applications, Extensions & Flavors](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Applications)  
Create or use add-ons to your wiki in the form of Applications, Extensions and Flavors.

![view-refresh.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/view-refresh.png?rev=1.6)

[RESTful](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/XWikiRESTfulAPI) remote API  
Use XWiki's RESTful remote API to easily integrate XWiki with your application.

![network-server.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/network-server.png?rev=1.6)

[Database Support](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/DatabaseSupport)  
Pages are stored in a relational database. Use your favorite database.

![keyboard-shortcuts.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/keyboard-shortcuts.png?rev=1.1)

[Keyboard Shortcuts](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/KeyboardShortcuts)  
Keyboard shortcuts help you save time since you never have to take your hands off the keyboard to use the mouse.

![edit-find-replace.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/edit-find-replace.png?rev=1.6)

[Page Lifecycle](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/DocumentLifecycle/)  
Create, Edit, Show, Print, Delete, Copy, Rename, Comment and Send By Mail pages.

![mail-attachment.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/mail-attachment.png?rev=1.6)

[Attachments](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Attachments)  
Attach as many files as you want to any page. These files can then be referenced and used in page contents.

![system-lock-screen.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/system-lock-screen.png?rev=1.6)

[Rights Management](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/RightsManagement)  
Control who can view, edit or delete pages in a flexible manner. Apply rights to a page, children pages or an entire wiki.

![user-groups-management.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/user-groups-management.png?rev=1.1)

[Users and Groups Management](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/UsersAndGroupsManagement)  
Add, delete and edit the users and groups in your wiki.

![black-rss.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/black-rss.png?rev=1.6)

[Getting notified](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Notifications)  
You can stay up to date with changes made to your wiki using RSS feeds, the Notifications application and more.

![preferences-desktop-theme.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/preferences-desktop-theme.png?rev=1.6)

[Skins](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Skins)  
Completely customize page templates, add menus, modify CSS files. You're in complete control of the look & feel.

![preferences-desktop-locale](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/preferences-desktop-locale?rev=1.6)

[Internationalization](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/I18N)  
Support different translations of your pages and have your users be automatically directed to version in their own language.

![accessibility.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/accessibility.png?rev=1.1)

[Accessibility](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Accessibility/)  
Support the diversity of user needs.

![utilities-system-monitor.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/utilities-system-monitor.png?rev=1.6)

[Scalability & Performance](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/ScalabilityPerformance)  
XWiki supports virtual wikis and allows Farms of wikis to be set up easily.

![document-new.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/document-new.png?rev=1.6)

[Document Templates & Forms](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Forms)  
Easily creates forms by simple visual editing, attach these forms to pages and query them.

![system-lock-screen.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/system-lock-screen.png?rev=1.6)

[Authentication](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Authentication)  
Describes the various authentication mechanisms suported by XWiki (Form, Basic, LDAP, Custom, etc).

![system-lock-screen.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/FeaturesExtract/system-lock-screen.png?rev=1.6)

[Distribution Wizard](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/DistributionWizard)  
Allows installing and upgrading your XWiki instances automatically.

# XWiki Standard Features

[XWiki Standard](http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/XWiki%20Standard%20Flavor/) is the [Flavor](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Applications#HFlavors) developed by the XWiki Dev Team. It contains the following features (in addition to the base features listed above), which are [Extensions](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Applications#HExtensions) installed by default.

![photos](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/photos.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Attachment](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Attachment%20Application)  
Provides a macro to easily upload and select attachments

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Attachment Picker](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Attachment/Picker/UI/)  
Integration of the attachment picker macro in all XWiki UIs (WYSIWYG Image Dialog)

![list-add.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Tag%20Application/list-add.png?rev=1.4)

[Tag](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Tag%20Application)  
Tag pages with keywords and navigate your wiki using these keywords

![color_swatch](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/color_swatch.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Bootswatch Themes for Flamingo](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Bootswatch%20Themes%20for%20Flamingo)  
Nice Themes for Flamingo created by Bootswatch.

![connect](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/connect.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Extension Manager](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Extension%20Manager%20Application)  
Install/update/remove Extensions in/from the wiki

![page_world](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/page_world.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Templates](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Templates%20Application/)  
A collection of content templates

![application_view_tile](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/application_view_tile.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Skin](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Skin%20Application)  
Create, edit and manage Skins

![system-search.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Search%20Application/system-search.png?rev=1.8)

[Search](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Search%20Application)  
Allows searching on the full wiki using wildcards, searching by space, getting search result RSS feeds and more

![house](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/house.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Wiki](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Wiki%20Application)  
Manage subwikis: create and delete subwikis, invite members

![help](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/help.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Help](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Help%20Application)  
Provides help within your wiki and showcases the main XWiki features through demo content

![application_view_tile](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/application_view_tile.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Dashboard](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Dashboard%20Application)  
Provides Wiki and User Dashboards

![user](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/user.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[User Directory](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/User%20Directory%20Application)  
Displays a directory of all users in the wiki

![wrench](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/wrench.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Icon Theme](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Icon%20Theme%20Application)  
Manage and display icons used all over the wiki

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Mail Resender](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Mail/MailResenderApplication/)  
Provides a Mail Resending Scheduler job

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Sandbox](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Sandbox%20Application/)  
Let people learn XWiki without the risk of breaking anything

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Model Validation UI](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Model/Validation/UI/)  
Admin UI for Model Validation

![link_break](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/link_break.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Link Checker](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Link%20Checker%20Application)  
Displays statuses of external links found in the wiki

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Attachment Validation](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Attachment/Validation/UI/)  
User Interface for the attachments validation

![annotations.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Annotations%20Application/annotations.png?rev=1.4)

[Annotations](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Annotations%20Application)  
Add annotations to documents

![text_align_justify](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/text_align_justify.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Logging](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Logging%20Application)  
Review and set logging levels dynamically

![heart](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/heart.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Like](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Like%20Application/)  
Like and unlike XWiki entities.

![application_form_add](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/application_form_add.png?cache-version=1711538035000)

[App Within Minutes](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/App%20Within%20Minutes%20Application)  
Create collaborative web applications within minutes, based on XWiki's powerful structured data management system

![color-themes.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Color%20Theme%20Application/color-themes.png?rev=1.3)

[Color Themes](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Color%20Theme%20Application)  
Ability to change skin colors

![status_busy](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/status_busy.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[CAPTCHA](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/CAPTCHA%20Application/)  
Configure which CAPTCHA implementation should your wiki use.

![text_kerning](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/text_kerning.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Rendering Administration](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Rendering%20Administration%20Application/)  
Select the markup syntaxes that can be used to write page content

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Tour](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Tour%20Application)  
Let users create tour guides for any page

![administration.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Administration%20Application/administration.png?rev=1.3)

[Administration](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Administration%20Application)  
Application for administrating wiki features like users, groups, rights etc.

![application_side_tree](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/application_side_tree.png?cache-version=1711538035000)

[Application Index](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Application%20Index%20Application/)  
Displays the list of installed Applications

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Mail](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Mail/MailApplication)  
Administration UI for mail configuration and statuses

![palette](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/palette.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Flamingo Theme](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Flamingo%20Theme%20Application)  
Visually customize any Flamingo-based skin and preview the results live + Default Themes

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Image Style](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Image/Style/UI/)  
Provide the UI to access the image styles on the Administration.

![page_white_acrobat](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/page_white_acrobat.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[PDF Export](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/PDF%20Export%20Application/)  
Adds support for exporting wiki pages to PDF on the client-side using the web browser.

![x-office-document.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Office%20Importer%20Application/x-office-document.png?rev=1.3)

[Office Importer](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Office%20Importer%20Application)  
Import Office documents, spreadsheets and presentations into wiki pages (most major office suite formats are supported)

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Font Awesome Icon Theme](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Font%20Awesome%20Icon%20Theme)  
Makes Font Awesome available as an Icon Theme

![heart_add](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/heart_add.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Share Page](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Share%20Page%20Application)  
Share a wiki page by email

![page_white_code](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/page_white_code.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Syntax Highlighting](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/EditorTools/Syntax%20Highlighting%20Application)  
Provides Syntax Highlighting

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[What's New](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/WhatsNewUI/)  
Provide information about what's new in XWiki

![bell](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/bell.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[User Mentions](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Mentions%20Application/)  
Mention users in wiki content.

![pencil](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/pencil.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Realtime WYSIWYG Editor](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Realtime%20WYSIWYG%20Editor/)  
Adds support for real-time WYSIWYG (rich-text) editing in XWiki.

![building_edit](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/building_edit.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[XClass](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/XClass%20Application)  
Helper pages for creating and listing Class/Template/Sheets

![magnifier](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/magnifier.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Solr Search](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Solr%20Search%20Application)  
Allows searching on the wiki using Apache Solr

![flag_red](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/flag_red.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[JCaptcha](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/JCaptcha%20Application/)  
CAPTCHA implementation using JCaptcha

![user_edit](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/user_edit.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[User Profile](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/User%20Module/User%20Profile%20Application/)  
Performs operations related to the User Profile (change preferences, user watchlist, follow users, etc)

![application_side_tree](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/application_side_tree.png?cache-version=1711538035000)

[Index](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Index%20Application)  
An Index of all pages, attachments, orphans and deleted pages and attachments found in the wiki.

![scheduler.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Scheduler%20Application/scheduler.png?rev=1.3)

[Scheduler](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Scheduler%20Application)  
Allows scheduling Jobs

![panels.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Panels%20Application/panels.png?rev=1.3)

[Panels](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Panels%20Application)  
Provides placeholders to put content located left or right of the page's content

![page_white_edit](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/page_white_edit.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[CKEditor Integration](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/CKEditor%20Integration/)  
Adds support for editing wiki pages using CKEditor.

![text_list_bullets](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/text_list_bullets.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Menu](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Menu%20Application)  
Menu application

![bell](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/bell.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Notifications](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/)  
Display notifications about events happening in the wiki.

![invitation.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Invitation%20Application/invitation.png?rev=1.3)

[Invitation](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Invitation%20Application)  
Allows users to send emails, inviting friends and colleagues to join a wiki

# Other Features

Other features can be added to your wiki by [installing](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Extension%20Manager%20Application) extensions not listed above. Check the [Extensions wiki](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/) for a full list of available extensions.
